snippet: Penn State could be paying out millions of dollars to victims of Jerry Sandusky after disclosing it had tentative agreements with some of those who say he sexually abused them.
abstract: Penn State discloses that it has tentative agreements with some of the young men who say they were sexually abused by former assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky, which could cost university millions in payouts; other college football items noted.
lead_paragraph: Penn State could be paying out millions of dollars to victims of Jerry Sandusky after disclosing it had tentative agreements with some of those who say he sexually abused them.

headline.main: Penn State Could Pay Millions of Dollars to Sandusky Accusers
headline.print_headline: Penn State Could Pay Millions in Abuse Cases
